Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #7 Harrison, #8 Halsted, or the #60 Blue Island/26th. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
